resources.string: Before you proceed you will have to give your credentials. We want to make sure it is you whom we are dealing with. After login you will be able to check in for treatment and view your estimated waiting time. You will only have to login once. Your credentials are your hospital medical record id and the access code you were given by the staff of the treatment center. \n Medical Record Id looks like 1234AB \nAccesscode looks like 1Q2J (four random symbols)
don\'t forget to make a new appointment!
You are checked in. Your waiting time will be displayed. You will be notified when it is your turn.
No problem. Take as much time as you need. You remain checked in. Your waiting time might change a litte.
There is an appointment for treatment today.
Its your turn now. You can go to the dressing room now or consult a staff member if you are unsure about what to do.
